About Me

Hi, my name is Itay and I'm a professional English tutor with my own business. My native language is German but I'm also fluent
in English, French, Hebrew, Portuguese and Spanish. Currently I'm learning Greek and I'm really enjoying it!


My hobbies are learning languages, hiking, traveling (so far I've been to 40 countries worldwide), cooking, playing with my dog
(he's a Belgian shepherd), meeting new people, having interesting conversations, watching documentaries (science, history,
artificial intelligence, economy, politics) and many more ... + Read more
